summary: Joseph Timothy White is a PFC who reportedly defected to North Korea. The documents primarily concern the investigation into his background, associations, and political views, particularly during his time at Kemper Military School & College (KMSC). An agent report details an interview with Henry D. Glaister concerning White, focusing on his background, associations, and political views during his time at KMSC. Another document relays information obtained from an interview with Joseph C. Merlino, who knew White at KMSC. The documents also involve obtaining permission from Henry D. Glaister to release an agent report about White to his father, Norval White Jr.
significance: While the documents do not explicitly link Joseph Timothy White to the JFK assassination, the fact that his background and associations are being investigated by an agency suggests a potential, though currently unclear, connection to events or individuals of interest in the JFK assassination context. The investigation focuses on his time at Kemper Military School & College and his reported defection to North Korea.
